trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Glendora
There were no other sightings in Glendora on or around November 5th 2010
divs: sighting detailswas headed out with my wife to watch a movie in glendora and i spotted what i first thought was a shooting star because of what appeared to have a tail and was red\orange but as we drove closer we noticed that it was not moving that fast. it was a pretty clear night with hardly any clouds. there were other lights in the sky that were obviously planes and helicopters but this light was moving slowly. both my wife and i were a bit weirded out, the object then changed colors got really bright and then it kinda imploded onto itself, dont know how else explain it. it wasn't a plane or a helicopter nor was it a blimp. to large to be a flare of some sort. well hope this helps, did anyone else report on this?
